verses.verse: <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H5493>declined<s%> neither to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, nor to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

¶ For in the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>, while he was yet <S%H5288>young<s%>, he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> after the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>: and in the <S%H8147%H6240>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H2891>purge<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and the <S%H842>groves<s%>, and the carved <S%H6456>images<s%>, and the molten <S%H4541>images<s%>.

And they brake <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%> of <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> in his <S%H6440>presence<s%>; and the <S%H2553>images<s%>, that were on high above <S%H4605>them<s%>, he cut <S%H1438>down<s%>; and the <S%H842>groves<s%>, and the carved <S%H6456>images<s%>, and the molten <S%H4541>images<s%>, he brake in <S%H7665>pieces<s%>, and made <S%H1854>dust<s%> of them, and <S%H2236>strowed<s%> it <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of them that had <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto them.
And he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> upon their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And so did he in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, even unto <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, with their <S%H2719>mattocks<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And when he had broken <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%> and the <S%H842>groves<s%>, and had <S%H3807>beaten<s%> the graven <S%H6456>images<s%> into <S%H1854>powder<s%>, and cut <S%H1438>down<s%> all the <S%H2553>idols<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

¶ Now in the <S%H8083%H6240>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>, when he had <S%H2891>purged<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%>, he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H683>Azaliah<s%>, and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H3098>Joah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3099>Joahaz<s%> the <S%H2142>recorder<s%>, to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>.

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, they <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H5592>doors<s%> had <S%H622>gathered<s%> of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and of all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and of all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; and they <S%H7725%H3427>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>put<s%> it in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6213%H4399>workmen<s%> that had the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H6213%H4399>workmen<s%> that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H918>repair<s%> and <S%H2388>amend<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Even to the <S%H2796>artificers<s%> and <S%H1129>builders<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> they it, to <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H4274>hewn<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, and <S%H6086>timber<s%> for <S%H4226>couplings<s%>, and to <S%H7136>floor<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> which the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H7843>destroyed<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H530>faithfully<s%>: and the <S%H5329>overseers<s%> of them were <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>; and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, of the sons of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>, to set it <S%H6485>forward<s%>; and other of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, all that could <S%H995>skill<s%> of <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>musick<s%>.

Also they were over the bearers of <S%H5449>burdens<s%>, and were <S%H5329>overseers<s%> of all that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> in any manner of <S%H5656>service<s%>: and of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> there were <S%H5608>scribes<s%>, and <S%H7860>officers<s%>, and <S%H7778>porters<s%>.

¶ And when they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was brought <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> given <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, I have <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>.

And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H935>carried<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> again, <S%H559>saying<s%>, All that was <S%H5414>committed<s%> <S%H3027>to<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, they <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

And they have gathered <S%H5413>together<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6485>overseers<s%>, and to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6213%H4399>workmen<s%>.

Then <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H5612>book<s%>. And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
And it came to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, and <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>, and <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for me, and for them that are <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, concerning the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%>: for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that is poured <S%H5413>out<s%> upon us, because our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> after all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%>.

And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, and they that the <S%H4428>king<s%> had appointed, <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H2468>Huldah<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess<s%>, the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8616%H8445>Tikvath<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2641>Hasrah<s%>, <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H899>wardrobe<s%>; (now she <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H4932>college<s%>:) and they <S%H1696>spake<s%> to her to that effect.
¶ And she <S%H559>answered<s%> them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>Tell<s%> ye the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to me,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, even all the <S%H423>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> which they have <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>:

Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and have burned <S%H6999%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, that they might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with all the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>; therefore my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall be poured <S%H5413>out<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>.

And as <S%H413>for<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, who <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, so shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> concerning the <S%H1697>words<s%> which thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%>;

Because thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H7401>tender<s%>, and thou didst <S%H3665>humble<s%> thyself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, when thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> against this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, and <S%H3665>humbledst<s%> thyself <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and didst <S%H7167>rend<s%> thy <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me; I have even <S%H8085>heard<s%> thee also, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Behold, I will <S%H622>gather<s%> thee to thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to thy <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>, neither shall thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the same. So they <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.
¶ Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6996>small<s%>: and he <S%H7121>read<s%> in their <S%H241>ears<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in his <S%H5977>place<s%>, and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and his <S%H5715>testimonies<s%>, and his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, with all his <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, to <S%H6213>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%>.

And he caused all that were <S%H4672>present<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> to it. And the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> took <S%H5493>away<s%> all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> out of all the <S%H776>countries<s%> that pertained to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and made all that were <S%H4672>present<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%>, even to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>. And all his <S%H3117>days<s%> they <S%H5493>departed<s%> not from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.
